mapper.select: ( SELECT '1' AS id, price, tupr.balance, tupr.place, twc.type AS name, tupr.ctime, order_id, card_no FROM tb_user_purchase_record tupr JOIN tb_water_card twc ON tupr.card_no = twc.code WHERE order_id = #{orderId} ) UNION (SELECT '2' AS id,price,turr.balance,'no' place, twc2.type AS name,turr.ctime,order_id,card_id AS card_no FROM tb_user_recharge_record turr JOIN tb_water_card twc2 ON turr.card_id=twc2.code WHERE order_id = #{orderId})

SELECT sum(water_consumption) AS water_consumption, sum(unit_cost * tb_user_purchase_record.water_consumption) AS unit_cost FROM tb_user_purchase_record WHERE DATE_FORMAT(ctime, '%Y-%m')=DATE_FORMAT(#{date}, '%Y-%m')
AND user_id=#{id}

SELECT count(*) FROM tb_user_purchase_record WHERE 1=1
And DATE_FORMAT(ctime, '%Y-%m-%d')=DATE_FORMAT(#{date}, '%Y-%m-%d')

SELECT sum((1 - tmu.cost_scale) * tupr.price) AS total_price, sum((1 - tmu.cost_scale) * tupr.price * tmu.ivision_proportion) AS price, DATE_FORMAT(tupr.ctime, '%m') AS name FROM tb_user_purchase_record AS tupr JOIN tb_collector AS tc ON tupr.collector_id = tc.id JOIN tb_manager_user AS tmu ON tmu.id = tc.property_id WHERE 1=1
AND DATE_FORMAT(tupr.ctime, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{date}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(tupr.ctime, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(#{date}, '%Y-%m')

SELECT sum((1 - (select cost_scale from tb_manager_user where id = tc.property_id) )*tupr.price)*(select sum(ivision_proportion) from tb_manager_user where user_type = #{type} and id in (SELECT manager_user_id from tb_manager_user_collector WHERE collector_id = tc.id )) AS price FROM tb_user_purchase_record tupr JOIN tb_collector tc ON tupr.collector_id = tc.id WHERE tc.id in (select id from tb_collector)
AND DATE_FORMAT(tupr.ctime, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{date}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(tupr.ctime, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(#{date}, '%Y-%m')

select.if: SELECT price, month(ctime) AS 'name' FROM tb_user_purchase_record WHERE card_no = #{defaultCardNo} AND DATE_FORMAT(ctime, '%Y') = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y') GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(ctime, '%m')
SELECT price, month(ctime) AS 'name' FROM tb_user_recharge_record WHERE card_id = #{defaultCardNo} AND DATE_FORMAT(ctime, '%Y') = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y') GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(ctime, '%m')
